action_output_list: The user wants to block a number and verify a setting in the SMS app. First, I need to open the Messages app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Messages"}
To block the number, I need to go to settings.{"action_type": "click", "index": 2}
To block a number, I need to find the blocking settings. I will scroll down to find the "Block numbers and spam" option.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down"}
The user wants to block the number '12345'. I need to click on "Block numbers and spam" to proceed.{"action_type": "click", "index": 3}
The user wants to block the number '12345'. I need to find the option to add a number to the block list.{"action_type": "click", "index": 2}
The user wants to block the number '12345'. I need to input the number into the text field.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "12345", "index": 9}
The user has entered the number '12345' to block. Now I need to click the 'Block' button to block the number.{"action_type": "click", "index": 2}
The user wants to verify that 'Block messages from not stored contacts' is disabled. I need to navigate back to the main settings menu to find this option.{"action_type": "navigate_back"}
The user wants to verify that 'Block messages from not stored contacts' is disabled. I need to scroll down to find the option.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 9}

The user wants to verify that 'Block messages from not stored contacts' is disabled. The current screen shows the settings menu, and I need to scroll to find the option.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 9}
